backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, draft and live version management with access control, plus public message read/write methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for feature tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their roles in the appâ€™s UI, logic, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style definitions and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React application root.
frontend/scripts/promote-draft-21-to-liv: Empty placeholder script file intended for promoting draft version 21.
frontend/scripts/promote-draft-to-live.t: Node script that authenticates as admin and promotes a draft version to live using backend canister APIs.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Documentation for scripts that promote draft builds to live versions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring navigation, sections, query client, notifications, and effects.
frontend/src/components/DedicationLayout: Simple layout wrapper applying consistent container width and padding.
frontend/src/components/FallingHeart.tsx: Component spawning animated falling icons and displaying a modal when images are clicked.
frontend/src/components/PhotoModal.tsx: Image modal with escape-close handling, body scroll lock, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/quiz/Celebration: Displays confetti, burst, and sparkle animations when triggered.
frontend/src/components/sections/Closing: Renders the closing message, decorative elements, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Empty placeholder file for a gallery section.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with background, dedication text, and a featured photo with error fallback.
frontend/src/components/sections/LetterS: Shows a heading and multiple dedication paragraphs laid out in a centered column.
frontend/src/components/sections/Moments: Displays a grid of memorable moments from content with titles, dates, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/PublicL: Lets users submit a public message and shows the latest message with loading and validation states.
frontend/src/components/sections/QuizSec: Runs a multi-question quiz with scoring, transitions, and celebration animations.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with smooth-scroll buttons to page sections.
frontend/src/content/dedicationContent.t: Provides static content for a dedication site including hero text, quiz data, letter paragraphs, and memory entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication, managing identity load, login, and logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicLatestMessag: Defines hooks to fetch and submit the latest public message using the actor API with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a hook to fetch the current user's profile via the actor with react-query, handling actor-dependent loading states.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global layout behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, container settings, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for adding a public no-login message submission feature that stores and displays only the newest message. Includes architectural notes, existing features, and pending backend and frontend feature requests.
